Hey, I'm Anubhav Maity, a ML Engineer at Expedia Group. My day job involves training, deploying, and keeping an eye on ML models for fraud detection.

Outside of my job, I immerse myself in NLP and Deep Learning through coursework, participation in Kaggle competitions, and reading of research papers, with a particular focus on Generative AI Models.

Join me on this blog as I share my ML experiences and insights. Let's explore the world of AI and data together.

Thanks for stopping by!
